home.subtitle: Premier boutique investment bank offering tailor made financial advisory services across U.S. and Latam

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Top tier financial and strategic advisory for our clients
services.description: NCP offers a wide range of financial advisory services to its clients, including M&A, capital raising and fairness opinions. Its members have worked for top tier financial institutions in deals spanning a wide range of industries, including Oil & Gas, agribusiness, real estate, energy, industrials, and others
services.text1: Expert guidance and execution for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and strategic partnerships, encompassing deal structuring, valuation, due diligence, and transaction management
services.text2: Strategic advisory and execution support for securing optimal funding across diverse sources, including equity, debt, and hybrid instruments, tailored to client needs and market conditions
services.text3: Provide expert guidance on complex financial transactions, including designing custom financial products to optimize capital structure, manage risk, and access non-traditional funding sources
services.text4: Rigorous analysis to determine the fair market value of assets, securities, or businesses, providing an objective benchmark for transaction pricing and stakeholder protection in corporate actions
